Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Lupercio F Luppi
Reviews.Content: Got it for my mother, working fine for her needs... order OK, no problems delivered as scheduled.  Recommend product and waiting for my upgrade to Galaxy S5 !!

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: charleane baquero
Reviews.Content: Works great I love it. And It's just the right size for my little hands. I have no complaints about this phone.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Karl McIntosh
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy S4 Mini is wonderful and better than is expecetd. i am very pleased with the purchased i made, thank you amazon.
